# Plot using ggplot2 with reordered and rotated x-axis labels
ggplot(state_data, aes(x = reorder(State, -as.numeric(sub("%", "", `Overall solved rate`))), 
                      y = as.numeric(sub("%", "", `Overall solved rate`)))) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "blue",  width = 0.7) +
  labs(title = "Clearance Rate Per State",
       subtitle = "All states solve over 50% of their homicide cases",
       y = "Clearance Rate (%)", x = "State") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) +
  coord_flip() +  # Flip coordinates for horizontal bars
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100))
